settings.myUniversalDocuments: O a'u Tulafono Fa'atino mo le Tausisia o Tulafono
settings.universalDocsDescription: O au tulafono ia e tausisia ai tulafono patino (Vaega 2). O nei taiala e faʻatatau i mea UMA e te fatuina, e tusa lava pe patino ma e le kamupani. Lafo i luga ou manaʻoga patino, tapulaʻa, ma tulafono o le sitaili iinei.
settings.personalComplianceInfo: O nei tulafono e siakiina mo au talaaga UMA. Mo tulafono faapitoa a le kamupani, alu i Fa'atulagaga a le Kamupani.

whatsNew.title: O le ā le mea fou
whatsNew.description: Fa'afouga ua iloa otometi ma foliga fou ua fa'aopoopo i le fa'avae

whatsNew.feature1: Suiga o le UI e otometi lava ona iloa
whatsNew.feature2: Fa'amatalaga na gaosia e le AI

adminGuide.title: Taiala a le Pulega
adminGuide.description: Taiala atoatoa mo pulega o le fausaga. Aoao pe faapefea ona pulea tagata faaaoga, mata'ituina auiliiliga, ma faatulaga faatulagaga o le polokalama.
adminGuide.feature1: Aotelega ma Iloiloga o le Fa'avae
adminGuide.feature2: Pulega o Tagata Fa'aoga ma Pisinisi
adminGuide.feature3: Lipoti Tau Tupe ma Tupe Maua

enterpriseGuide.title: Taiala Fa'apisinisi
enterpriseGuide.description: Taiala mo pulega o kamupani. Aoao e pulea lau 'au, fa'atulaga fa'avae o le malamalama, ma taulimaina fa'amaoniga o anotusi.
enterpriseGuide.feature2: Fa'avae o le Malamalamaaga a le Kamupani
enterpriseGuide.feature3: Fa'asologa o Galuega Fa'amaonia o Mataupu

userGuide.title: Taiala a le Tagata Fa'aoga
userGuide.description: Mea uma e te manaʻomia e fatu ai, iloilo ai, ma lolomi ai anotusi. E fetaui lelei mo tagata e fatuina anotusi ma tagata maketi.
userGuide.feature1: Meafaigaluega mo le Fausiaina o Mataupu ma le AI
userGuide.feature2: Su'esu'ega o Mataupu ma le Tausisia o le Tausisia
userGuide.feature4: Feso'ota'iga o Ala o Faasalalauga Lautele

overview.intro: I le avea ai ma se pule o le fausaga, e mafai ona e mauaina meafaigaluega atoatoa mo le mataituina ma le puleaina o le fausaga atoa o le Contentry. O lenei taʻiala o le a fesoasoani ia te oe e malamalama ai i ou tomai faʻapulega.
overview.dashboardDesc: O le Admin Dashboard e maua ai se vaaiga lautele o gaoioiga ma le soifua maloloina o le fausaga.
overview.feature1: Mata'ituina o gaoioiga a tagata fa'aoga i le taimi moni
overview.feature2: Iloiloga o anotusi i le fausaga atoa
overview.feature3: Fua fa'atatau o le soifua maloloina ma le fa'atinoga o le polokalama
overview.feature4: Avanoa vave i galuega taua tau pulega
overview.tip: Asiasi soo i le Admin Dashboard ina ia e logoina pea e uiga i aga masani o le fausaga ma ia vave iloa ai faafitauli e ono tula'i mai.

userManagement.intro: O le puleaina o tagata faʻaoga o se galuega autu tau pulega e mafai ai ona e vaʻaia tagata faʻaoga uma ma pisinisi i luga o le fausaga.
userManagement.viewUsersDesc: Ulufale i le vaega o le Pulega o Tagata Fa'aoga e matamata ai, su'e, ma pulea tagata fa'aoga uma o le fausaga fa'avae.
userManagement.feature1: Saili ma faamama tagata faʻaoga e ala i le igoa, imeli, poʻo le matafaioi
userManagement.feature2: Va'ai fa'amatalaga auiliili o tagata fa'aoga ma tala'aga o gaioiga
userManagement.feature3: Suia matafaioi ma fa'atagaga a tagata fa'aoga
userManagement.feature4: Tape pe tape tala a tagata faʻaoga pe a manaʻomia
userManagement.rolesTitle: Malamalama i Matafaioi a Tagata Faʻaoga
userManagement.rolesDesc: E tolu matafaioi autū a le tagata faʻaoga o le Contentry:
userManagement.role1: Pule: Avanoa atoa i le fausaga fa'atasi ai ma gafatia fa'atulagaina o le polokalama
userManagement.role2: Pule o le Kamupani: Pulea le 'au a le latou kamupani ma ona fa'atulagaga
userManagement.role3: Tagata fa'aoga: Vaega masani o le fatuina o anotusi ma le auiliiliga
userManagement.warning: Ia siaki muamua le aafiaga a'o le'i suia matafaioi a tagata fa'aoga pe tapeina fo'i tala. O nei gaioiga e ono a'afia ai le faiga o galuega a le 'au.

analytics.intro: E maua mai i le au'ili'iliga ni malamalamaga loloto i le auala o lo'o fa'aogaina ai le fa'avae i pisinisi uma ma tagata fa'aoga.
analytics.metric1: Aofa'i o tagata fa'aoga toaga ma aga masani o le tuputupu a'e
analytics.metric2: Tele o le fatuina ma le auiliiliga o anotusi
analytics.metric3: Fua faatatau o le auai i le fausaga
analytics.metric4: Fa'amatalaga o le fa'aaogaina o vaega
analytics.metric5: Tausisia o tulafono ma togi o tulaga lamatia i pisinisi uma
analytics.tip: Auina atu i fafo lipoti o auiliiliga mo faʻaaliga a i latou e aʻafia e faʻaaoga ai le vaega o le Download Report.

financials.intro: O le vaega o le Aotelega Tau Tupe e maua ai se vaʻaiga i tupe maua mai le fausaga ma fua faʻatatau o lesitala.
financials.revenueDesc: Mata'ituina le soifua maloloina tau tupe ma aga masani o lesitala i pisinisi uma.
financials.feature1: Siakiina o tupe maua faifaipea faalemasina (MRR)
financials.feature2: Tufatufaina o le vaega o le lesitalaina
financials.feature3: Fa'aaogaina o aitalafu ma le tala'aga o fa'atauga

systemConfig.intro: O le fa'atulagaina o le polokalama e mafai ai ona e pulea fa'atulagaga ma feso'ota'iga lautele.
systemConfig.integrationsDesc: Fa'atulaga ma mata'ituina feso'ota'iga a isi vaega:
systemConfig.integration1: Ayrshare API mo le lolomiina o ala o faasalalauga lautele
systemConfig.integration2: Auaunaga AI mo le gaosiga ma le auiliiliga o anotusi
systemConfig.integration3: Fa'agasologa o totogi e ala i le Stripe
systemConfig.tip: Ia fa'ata'ita'i i taimi uma feso'ota'iga i totonu o se siosiomaga fa'atulagaina a'o le'i faia ni suiga i fa'atulagaga o le gaosiga.

gettingStarted.intro: Susu mai i le Contentry! I le avea ai ma se Pule o Pisinisi, o loʻo ia te oe meafaigaluega e pulea ai lau 'au, faʻatuina ni taʻiala o anotusi, ma faʻamautinoa le tutusa o le faʻailoga.
gettingStarted.setupDesc: Mulimuli i laasaga nei e seti ai lau teugatupe faapisinisi:
gettingStarted.step1: Alu i Fa'atulagaga > Fa'alapotopotoga Fa'apisinisi e maua ai le dashboard a lau kamupani
gettingStarted.step2: Lafo i luga taiala ma faiga faavae a lau kamupani i le Knowledge Base
gettingStarted.step3: Valaaulia tagata o lau 'au ma tofia matafaioi talafeagai
gettingStarted.step4: Fa'atulaga auala fa'amaonia mo le iloiloga o anotusi
gettingStarted.tip: Fa'amae'a le fa'atulagaina o lau Fa'avae o le Poto a'o le'i vala'auliaina tagata o le 'au e fa'amautinoa e mafai ona latou maua taiala o fa'ailoga mai le aso muamua.

teamManagement.intro: O le pulega lelei o 'au e fa'amautinoa ai le sologa lelei o le galulue fa'atasi ma le pulea lelei o avanoa i totonu o lau fa'alapotopotoga.
teamManagement.inviteDesc: Fa'aopoopo ni sui fou i lau 'au fa'apisinisi:
teamManagement.feature1: Ulufale i le tuatusi imeli a le sui o le 'au
teamManagement.feature2: Filifili a latou matafaioi (Le Foafoa, Pule, poʻo le Pule)
teamManagement.feature3: Fa'aopoopo se savali patino e te mana'o ai i le vala'aulia
teamManagement.rolesDesc: Tofia matafaioi e faʻavae i tiutetauave:
teamManagement.role1: Foafoa: E mafai ona fatuina ma tuʻuina atu anotusi mo le faʻamaoniga
teamManagement.role2: Pule: E mafai ona faʻamaonia/teena anotusi ma pulea le au fatuina
teamManagement.role3: Pule: Avanoa atoa mo pisinisi e aofia ai pili ma fa'atulagaga
teamManagement.tip: E muta le aogā o valaaulia pe a mavae aso e 7. Faamanatu i tagata o le 'au e talia a latou valaaulia i le taimi lava lena.

knowledgeBase.intro: O le Fa'avae o le Poto o le nofoaga autu lea e teu ai ta'iala a lau kamupani, faiga fa'avae, ma tulafono o anotusi. O pepa o lo'o lafoina iinei e fa'amatalaina ai anotusi ua gaosia e le AI mo tagata uma o le 'au.
knowledgeBase.uploadDesc: Fa'aopoopo pepa o le a taialaina ai le fatuina o anotusi:
knowledgeBase.docType1: Taiala i le faiga o fa'ailoga ma taiala i leo
knowledgeBase.docType2: Faiga fa'avae fa'aletulafono ma le tausisia o tulafono
knowledgeBase.docType3: Taiala mo le lafoina o faasalalauga faaagafesootai
knowledgeBase.tip: La'u muamua i luga au taiala taua o le fa'ailoga. E fa'amuamua e le AI pepa i totonu o le Fa'avae o le Poto o le kamupani nai lo le lafoina i luga e tagata ta'ito'atasi.

approvalWorkflow.intro: O le faagasologa o faamaoniga e faamautinoa ai o anotusi uma e ausia tulaga faatonuina a lau kamupani a'o le'i lolomiina.
approvalWorkflow.processDesc: E tafe atu anotusi i nei laʻasaga:
approvalWorkflow.step1: E gaosia pe iloiloina e le foafoa anotusi
approvalWorkflow.step2: Ua tuʻuina atu anotusi mo le faʻamaoniga (pe a manaʻomia)
approvalWorkflow.step3: Iloilo ma tuʻuina atu e le pule ni manatu faaalia
approvalWorkflow.step4: E mafai ona lolomiina anotusi ua faamaonia i luga o fausaga faaagafesootai
approvalWorkflow.warning: Fa'agaoioia mana'oga fa'amaonia i Fa'atulagaga e fa'amautinoa ai ua toe iloiloina uma anotusi a'o le'i fa'asalalauina.

billing.intro: Pulea lau saofaga fa'apisinisi ma mata'ituina le fa'aaogaina o aitalafu.
billing.subscriptionDesc: O lau dashboard o pili e maua ai:
billing.feature1: Fa'amatalaga o le fuafuaga o lo'o iai nei ma le vaevaeina o aitalafu
billing.feature2: Talafa'asolopito o le fa'aaogaina ma aitalafu o totoe
billing.feature3: Talafa'asolopito o pili ma auala e totogi ai

adminUsersPage.deleteWarning: E le mafai ona toe faaleaogaina lenei gaioiga.

userDetails.title: Fa'amatalaga a le Tagata Fa'aoga
userDetails.currentPeriodEnd: Fa'ai'uga o le Vaitaimi o lo'o iai nei

deleteModal.title: Tape le Tagata Fa'aoga
deleteModal.description: O le a tapeina tumau ai le tagata faʻaoga ma faʻamatalaga uma e fesoʻotaʻi i ai:
deleteModal.irreversible: E le mafai ona toe faaleaogaina lenei gaioiga.

gettingStarted.intro: Susū mai i le Contentry! O lenei taʻiala o le a fesoasoani ia te oe e fatu ai ni anotusi mataʻina ma tausisia tulafono e faʻaaoga ai meafaigaluega faʻaaogaina le AI.
gettingStarted.step1: Fa'atulaga lau talaaga i fa'amatalaga sa'o
gettingStarted.step3: Fausia se Fa'amatalaga Fa'ata'atitia mo lau fa'ailoga po'o lau fa'asalalauga
gettingStarted.tip: Amata i se Talaaga Fa'ata'atitia e fa'amautinoa ai o au anotusi uma e faatumauina le agaga ma le savali tutusa.

contentCreation.intro: O le gaosiga o anotusi a le Contentry e fa'aaogaina le AI e fesoasoani ia te oe e fatuina ai ni pou manaia i ni nai sekone.
contentCreation.generateDesc: Fausia anotusi e faʻaaoga ai le AI:
contentCreation.feature1: Ulufale i se autu po'o se fa'amatalaga e fa'amatala ai le mea e te mana'o e fa'asalalauina
contentCreation.feature2: Filifili au fa'avae fa'atatau (LinkedIn, Twitter, Facebook, ma isi)
contentCreation.feature3: Filifili le leo tusitusi e te fiafia i ai
contentCreation.feature4: Filifili e fatu se ata e o faatasi ma oe
contentCreation.schedule1: Fa'atulaga ni fa'asologa o le gaosiga o anotusi faifai pea
contentCreation.schedule2: Filifili aso ma taimi patino mo le lafoina otometi
contentCreation.schedule3: Fa'agaoioia le fa'asalalauina otometi pe toe iloilo lima a'o le'i fa'asalalauina
contentCreation.tip: Faaaoga le pusa siaki 'Mataupu Fa'alauiloa' pe a fatuina pou fa'asalalauga e fa'amautinoa ai o lo'o iloiloina e le au'ili'iliga o le tausisia o tulafono fa'alauiloa.

analyzeContent.intro: O le vaega o le Iloiloina o Mataupu e iloilo ai au mataupu mo le tausisia o tulafono, le maaleale i aganu'u, ma le ogatasi o fa'ailoga.
analyzeContent.howToDesc: Tuuina atu anotusi mo le iloiloga:
analyzeContent.step1: Alu i le Fa'atonutonuina o Mataupu > Iloilo Mataupu
analyzeContent.step2: Faapipii lau anotusi i totonu o le vaega o tusitusiga
analyzeContent.step3: Filifili se Talaaga Fa'ata'atitia mo le tulaga
analyzeContent.step4: Kiliki le Analyze e maua ai ni fa'amatalaga auiliili
analyzeContent.type1: Usita'ia o tulafono ma taiala a le kamupani
analyzeContent.type2: Tulaga maaleale fa'aleaganuu i itulagi eseese
analyzeContent.type3: Tutusa o le leo ma le leo o le fa'ailoga
analyzeContent.tip: Ia iloilo pea anotusi a'o le'i fa'asalalauina i fa'asalalauga i fafo, aemaise lava mo fa'asalalauga e fa'atatau i le tele o itulagi.

strategicProfiles.intro: O Talaaga Fa'ata'atitia e fa'amatalaina ai le talaaga, le uiga, ma ta'iala mo le fatuina ma le auiliiliga o anotusi.
strategicProfiles.feature1: Fa'amatala le aofia fa'amoemoeina ma le fa'amoemoega o le talaaga
strategicProfiles.feature2: Fa'atulaga ni mafaufauga fa'aleaganuu ma fa'aitulagi
strategicProfiles.feature3: Lafo i luga pepa ma taiala e patino i talaaga patino
strategicProfiles.feature4: Fa'atulaga leo masani ma mea e te fiafia i ai i le sitaili
strategicProfiles.tip: Fausia ni Talaaga Fa'ata'atitia eseese mo tauvaga eseese, fa'ailoga, po'o maketi fa'aitulagi.

socialAccounts.intro: Feso'ota'i au tala fa'asalalauga fa'aagafesootai e lolomi sa'o ai anotusi mai le Contentri.
socialAccounts.connectDesc: O fa'avae lagolagoina e aofia ai:
socialAccounts.platform1: LinkedIn - Itulau Patino ma Itulau Kamupani
socialAccounts.warning: Ia fa'afouina pea au feso'ota'iga i tala fa'aagafesootai. O fa'ailoga ua uma le aoga e ono taofia ai le lolomiina o pou ua fa'atulagaina.

approvalProcess.intro: Afai ua fa'agaoioia e lau pisinisi le faiga o galuega fa'amaonia, e tatau ona toe iloilo muamua anotusi a'o le'i lolomiina.
approvalProcess.submitDesc: O le faagasologa o le faamaoniga:
approvalProcess.step2: Kiliki le 'Lafo mo le Fa'amaoniga' e lafo atu i lau pule
approvalProcess.step3: Siaki le tulaga o le fa'amaoniga i le fa'asologa o le Fa'amaoniga o lo'o Fa'atali
approvalProcess.tip: Fa'aopoopo ni fa'amatalaga pe a tu'uina atu anotusi e tu'uina atu ai i le au iloilo le anotusi e uiga i au fa'ai'uga fatufatua'i.

aboutGuide.title: E uiga i & Faiga Sili
aboutGuide.description: Aoao po o le a le fa'aoga o le Contentry ma saili faiga sili ona lelei e fa'aleleia atili ai lau fatuina o anotusi, fefa'ataua'iga fa'ailoga, ma fa'amatalaga o tagata e iai mana'oga fa'apitoa.
aboutGuide.feature2: Fautuaga mo le Fa'aleleia o Mataupu
aboutGuide.feature4: Fa'atulagaina o le Talaaga o le Tagata Fa'atosina

whatIsContentry.intro: O le Contentri o se fa'avae atamai o anotusi e fa'aaogaina le AI ua mamanuina e fesoasoani ai i tagata e fatuina anotusi, tagata maketi, ma pisinisi e fatuina, iloilo, ma lolomiina anotusi e tausisia tulafono i se tulaga lautele. Pe o oe o se tagata e faatosina oe lava pe o se vaega o se 'au maketi tele, e fa'afaigofie e le Contentri lau faiga o anotusi.
whatIsContentry.missionDesc: Matou te talitonu i le faʻamalosia o le au foafoa i meafaigaluega atamamai e faʻamautinoa ai o anotusi uma e ogatasi ma le faʻailoga, e aʻafia ai aganuʻu, ma e tausisia taiala o le fausaga.
whatIsContentry.benefit1: O le gaosiga o anotusi e fa'aaogaina e le AI e fetaui ma le leo o lau fa'ailoga
whatIsContentry.benefit2: Siakiina o le tausisia o tulafono faatonutonu i le taimi moni
whatIsContentry.benefit3: Su'esu'ega o le maaleale fa'aleaganuu mo tagata maimoa i le lalolagi atoa
whatIsContentry.benefit4: Fa'afaigofieina o le fa'atinoina o galuega fa'amaonia mo 'au fa'apisinisi
whatIsContentry.tip: E tu'ufa'atasia e le Contendry le mana o le AI fa'atasi ai ma le va'ava'aiga a tagata e tu'uina atu ai anotusi e fetaui ma lau aofia a'o tumau pea ona usita'i.

keyFeatures.intro: E tuʻuina atu e le Contentry se seti atoatoa o meafaigaluega e pulea ai lau taʻamilosaga atoa o anotusi:
keyFeatures.aiContentTitle: Fatuina o Mataupu e Fa'aaogaina e le AI
keyFeatures.aiContentDesc: Fausia ni anotusi maualuga e fetaui ma lau faʻailoga ma le aofia:
keyFeatures.aiFeature1: Fausiaina o anotusi i le tele o fausaga (LinkedIn, Twitter, Facebook, Instagram)
keyFeatures.aiFeature2: Leo tusitusi e mafai ona fetu'una'i (Fa'apolofesa, Fa'asamasamanoa, Musuia)
keyFeatures.aiFeature3: O le gaosiga o ata AI e fa'atasi ma au pou
keyFeatures.complianceDesc: Ia mautinoa o au anotusi e ausia manaʻoga uma aʻo leʻi lolomiina:
keyFeatures.complianceFeature1: Siakiina otometi o le tausisia o tulafono faatonutonu a le kamupani
keyFeatures.complianceFeature2: Fa'ailoga o le maaleale fa'aleaganuu mo tagata maimoa fa'avaomalo
keyFeatures.complianceFeature3: Iloiloga o tulaga lamatia faatasi ai ma fautuaga faatino
keyFeatures.tip: Faaaoga Talaaga Fa'ata'atitia e fa'amautinoa ai le tutusa o le leo o se fa'ailoga i anotusi uma ua fatuina.

bestPractices.intro: O le mulimuli i nei faiga sili ona lelei o le a fesoasoani ia te oe e maua ai le tele o mea mai le Contentry ma fatuina ni anotusi e lelei lona faatinoga:
bestPractices.workflowTitle: Fa'atuina se Fa'asologa o Galuega o Mataupu
bestPractices.workflowDesc: O se faiga fa'agasolo faifai pea e fa'amautinoa ai le lelei ma le aoga:
bestPractices.workflow1: Amata i le fa'atulagaina o lau Talaaga Fa'ata'atitia fa'atasi ai ma ta'iala o fa'ailoga
bestPractices.workflow2: Fausia anotusi ma le mafaufau i se tulaga faapitoa ma se aofia
bestPractices.workflow3: Ia iloilo pea anotusi a'o le'i fa'asalalauina i fa'avae i fafo
bestPractices.workflow4: Faaaoga vaega fa'atulagaina e fa'atumauina ai le saoasaoa tutusa o le fa'asalalauga
bestPractices.consistencyTitle: Tausia le Tumau o le Fa'ailoga
bestPractices.consistencyDesc: O le fa'ailogaina faifai pea e fausia ai le fa'atuatuaga ma le iloa:
bestPractices.consistency1: Lafo i luga lau taiala o le sitaili o le ituaiga i le Fa'avae o le Malamalama
bestPractices.consistency2: Faaaoga le Talaaga Fa'ata'atitia lava e tasi mo tauvaga feso'ota'i
bestPractices.consistency3: Iloilo mea ua gaosia e le AI e fa'amautinoa e fetaui ma lou leo
bestPractices.warning: Ia iloilo pea mea ua gaosia e le AI a'o le'i lolomiina. E ui o lo matou AI e malosi, ae o le vaavaaiga a tagata e mautinoa ai taunuuga sili ona lelei.

optimizeContent.intro: O le fatuina o anotusi lelei e na'o le amataga. O le auala lea e fa'aleleia atili ai le auai maualuga:
optimizeContent.platformDesc: E tofu lava fausaga fa'avae ma mana'oga tulaga ese ma fa'amoemoega a le aofia:
optimizeContent.platform1: LinkedIn: Taula'i i malamalamaaga fa'apolofesa, fa'aaoga upu autu o le alamanuia, taliaina le pepa umi
optimizeContent.platform2: Twitter/X: Fe'au pu'upu'u, fa'aaoga ma le atamai hashtags, auai i autu o lo'o lauiloa
optimizeContent.platform3: Facebook: E lelei le fa'atinoga o mea vaaia, fa'amalosia ai le auai o le nu'u
optimizeContent.platform4: Instagram: E taua tele ata vaaia lelei, fa'aaoga hashtags talafeagai, Tala mo le fa'aauauina o fegalegaleaiga
optimizeContent.engagement1: Lafo pea i taimi sili ona lelei mo lau aofia
optimizeContent.engagement2: Faaaoga ni vala'au-e-gaioiga mata'ina i au anotusi
optimizeContent.engagement3: Tali atu i faʻamatalaga ma fegalegaleai ma lau nuʻu
optimizeContent.engagement4: Siaki au'ili'iliga ina ia malamalama po'o a anotusi e sili ona lelei lona fa'atinoga
optimizeContent.tip: Faaaoga le vaega faatulagaina a le Contetry e lafo ai i taimi sili ona lelei e aunoa ma se taumafaiga lima.

brandDeals.intro: E mafai e faiga faapaaga fa'apisinisi ona avea ma se auala tele e maua ai tupe. O le auala lenei e fa'aleleia atili ai lau auala:
brandDeals.preparationDesc: Ia sauni pe a tulaʻi mai avanoa:
brandDeals.prep1: Tausia se faila o anotusi fa'apolofesa ma tutusa
brandDeals.prep2: Siaki ma fa'aali au fua fa'atatau o le auai
brandDeals.prep3: Fausia se pusa fa'asalalauga e fa'atasi ai ma au fa'amatalaga ma le aapa atu i ai
brandDeals.prep4: Faaaoga le Contentry e fatu ai ni faʻataʻitaʻiga o manatu o anotusi faʻailogaina
brandDeals.pitchingTitle: Fa'alauiloa atu i Fa'ailoga Tau Fefa'ataua'iga
brandDeals.pitch1: Fa'afetaui lau fa'asalalauga ma tulaga taua o le fa'ailoga ma le aofia fa'amoemoeina
brandDeals.pitch2: Tu'uina atu ni manatu patino mo anotusi nai lo ni fautuaga masani
brandDeals.pitch3: Aofia ai le au'ili'iliga o le tausisia o tulafono e fa'aalia ai o au anotusi e ausia taiala
brandDeals.tip: Faaaoga le siakiina o le tausisia o tulafono a le Contentriry pe a fatuina anotusi lagolago e faamautinoa ai ua ausia manaoga o le FTC ma le fausaga faavae mo le faailoaina atu.

influencerProfiles.intro: O lau Fuafuaga Fa'ata'atitia o le fa'avae lea o lau fuafuaga o anotusi. O le auala lenei e fa'aleleia atili ai:
influencerProfiles.setupDesc: O se talaaga ua faatulagaina lelei e mautinoa ai le tutusa o anotusi, e tusa ai ma le ituaiga:
influencerProfiles.setup1: Fa'amatala manino lau vaega fa'apitoa ma le aofia fa'atatau
influencerProfiles.setup2: Seti lau leo ma le sitaili tusitusi e te fiafia i ai
influencerProfiles.setup3: Fa'aopoopo ni mafaufauga fa'aleaganuu ma fa'aitulagi mo lau aofia
influencerProfiles.setup4: Lafo i luga pepa fa'asinomaga e fa'amatala ai le leo o lau fa'ailoga
influencerProfiles.optimizeTitle: Fa'aleleia atili o le Fa'atinoga o le Fa'amatalaga
influencerProfiles.optimizeDesc: Fa'aleleia pea lau talaaga mo ni taunuuga lelei:
influencerProfiles.optimize1: Toe iloilo anotusi ua faia ma fetu'una'i fa'atulagaga o talaaga pe a mana'omia
influencerProfiles.optimize2: Fausia ni talaaga eseese mo ni tauvaga po'o ni aofia eseese
influencerProfiles.optimize3: Ia fa'afouina pea lau Fa'avae o le Poto i ta'iala fou o fa'ailoga
influencerProfiles.tip: Toe iloilo lau Talaaga Fa'ata'atitia i kuata ta'itasi e fa'amautinoa ai o lo'o atagia ai lau fa'ailoga ma au maimoa o lo'o fa'agasolo pea.

workflowsGuide.title: Taʻiala mo Galuega ma le Faʻailogaina
workflowsGuide.description: Aoao pe faapefea ona galue le faiga o togi ma malamalama i la'asaga ta'itasi o le faagasologa o galuega mai le auiliiliga o anotusi e oo atu i le faamaoniga.
workflowsGuide.feature1: Fa'amatalaga o le Faiga o le Sikoa
workflowsGuide.feature2: Iloilo le Faasologa o Galuega o Mataupu
workflowsGuide.feature3: Faiga o le Fausiaina o Mataupu

scoring.intro: O le faiga o togi i le Contentry e tuʻuina atu ai le togi manino, e faʻavae i luga o faʻasalaga e fesoasoani ia te oe e malamalama ai i le faʻatinoga o au anotusi. O togi uma e amata i le 100 ma e toʻesea togi mo soliga poʻo faʻafitauli patino na maua.
scoring.overallScoreDesc: O le togi atoa o se tuufaatasiga mamafa o mea uma o le auiliiliga, e amata mai le 0 i le 100:
scoring.scoreRange1: 80-100: Sili Ona Lelei - Sauni e lolomi, ua matuā fa'alelei lelei anotusi
scoring.scoreRange2: 60-79: Lelei - Fa'aleleiga laiti ua fautuaina a'o le'i lolomiina
scoring.scoreRange3: 40-59: Manaʻomia le Gauaʻi Atu - Manaʻomia le Iloiloga ma le Toe Teuteuina
scoring.scoreRange4: 0-39: Fa'ailogaina - Fa'afitauli taua, aua le lolomiina se'ia vagana ua foia
scoring.overallCalcDesc: O le togi atoa e faʻaaogaina le mamafa fetuʻunaʻi e faʻavae i luga o le tulaga lamatia:
scoring.overallCalc3: Lamatiaga o le Igoa Tauleleia (Aganuu ≤50): (Usita'i i Tulafono × 40%) + (Aganuu × 40%) + (Sa'o × 20%)
scoring.overallCalc4: Lamatiaga Matuia (Usita'i ≤40): O le aofa'i atoa o togi e fa'atapula'aina i le maualuga o le 40
scoring.componentsDesc: O lau togi atoa e fuafuaina mai vaega autū e tolu e faʻaaogaina ai se faiga faʻavae i faʻasalaga:
scoring.component1: Sikoa o le Tausisia o Tulafono: Amata i le 100, e to'esea ai 'ai mo soliga ta'itasi e maua
scoring.component2: Sikoa o le Ma'ale'ale Fa'aleaganuu: Averesi o itu fa'aleaganuu e 6 a Hofstede
scoring.component3: Sikoa Sa'o: Amata i le 100, e to'esea ai 'ai mo mea sese pe fa'afitauli e maua
scoring.complianceDetailTitle: Sikoa o le Tausisia o Tulafono (E Fa'avae i Fa'asalaga)
scoring.complianceDetailDesc: E amata pou uma i le Sikoa Tausisia o le 100. E to'esea 'ai mo soliga ta'itasi:
scoring.complianceSeverity1: Soliga Fa'aletulafono Matuia (-60 pts): Soliga o le NDA, fa'asalalauina o fa'amatalaga fa'alilolilo → Lamatiaga vave o le fa'amutaina
scoring.complianceSeverity2: Soliga Matuia (-40 pts): Fa'asauā, fa'ailoga tagata, tautala fa'a'ino'ino → Lamatiaga fa'aletulafono
scoring.complianceSeverity3: Soliga Maualuga (-25 pts): Leai se fa'asalalauga fa'asalalau, soliga o tulafono fa'avae → Lamatiaga o sala tupe/fa'amalologa
scoring.complianceSeverity4: Soliga Feololo (-10 pts): Leo lē talafeagai, fa'aletonu la'ititi i taiala → A'oa'oga/lapataiga
scoring.complianceSeverity5: Fa'ata'ita'iga: Ua misi le #ad (-25) + Fa'afitauli o le leo (-10) = Sikoa mulimuli o le 65
scoring.complianceAdjustment: Fa'aputuga o soliga e tele - e fa'aopoopoina fa'atasi fa'asalaga ta'itasi
scoring.complianceViolationTypes: Soliga ua siakiina: Faʻamatalaga faʻalilolilo, Faʻasauā, Soliga o le NDA, Faʻasalalauina ua misi, Soliga o tulafono faʻavae, Leo le talafeagai
scoring.culturalDetailDesc: O le togi fa'aleaganuu o le averesi lea o fua fa'aleaganuu aloaia e ono a Hofstede (0-100 i le fua fa'aleaganuu):
scoring.culturalDim1: Mamao o le Malosiaga: Aloaia, faaaloalo i le pule vs. tutusa, leo masani
scoring.culturalDim2: Ta'ito'atasi vs. Fa'atasi: Taula'iga 'A'u/A'u' vs. Taula'iga 'Tatou/Tatou' i le alalafaga
scoring.culturalDim3: Faatama vs. Fafine: Gagana tauva/faamalosi vs. gagana galulue faatasi/maliega
scoring.culturalDim4: Aloese mai le Lē Mautinoa: Tulafono, saogalemu, faamamafa o le manino vs. tatala i le lē mautonu
scoring.culturalDim5: Fa'asinomaga mo se Taimi Umi: Taula'i i taui i le lumanai vs. manuia i se taimi pu'upu'u
scoring.culturalDim6: Fa'afiafiaga Fa'amalieina vs. Taofiofi: Fa'amoemoe lelei/fiafia vs. gagana fa'apito/pulea
scoring.culturalCalc: Sikoa Fa'aleaganuu = (Aofa'i o togi e 6 vaega) ÷ 6
scoring.culturalRisk: A pa'ū le Sikoa Fa'aleaganuu i lalo ifo o le 50, o le a fa'aogaina le mamafa o le 'Lamatiaga o le Igoa' e puipuia ai lau fa'ailoga i tagata lautele i le lalolagi atoa.
scoring.accuracyDetailDesc: E amata pou uma i le Sikoa Sa'o e 100. E to'esea 'ai mo fa'afitauli e maua:
scoring.accuracyCheck1: Sese Tele/Fa'amatalaga Sese (-40 pts): Fa'amatalaga sese, fa'amatalaga pepelo
scoring.accuracyCheck2: Punaoa e Lē Talitonuina (-20 pts): Fa'amatalaga mai punaoa e lē fa'atuatuaina
scoring.accuracyCheck3: Tagi e lē mafai ona fa'amaonia (-10 pts): Fa'amatalaga e lē mafai ona siakiina mea moni
scoring.accuracyCheck4: Faʻataʻitaʻiga: Faʻamatalaga sese (-40) + Punaoa e leʻi faʻamaonia (-20) = Sikoa mulimuli o le 40
scoring.accuracyCalc: E tele fa'afitauli e fa'aputu - e fa'aopoopoina fa'atasi fa'asalaga ta'itasi
scoring.flagStatusTitle: Fa'ailoga o le Tulaga o le Fu'a
scoring.flagStatusDesc: E otometi lava ona fa'ailogaina anotusi e fa'atatau i taunu'uga o su'esu'ega:
scoring.flag1: Ufiufi Lelei (Lanumeamata): Sikoa e sili atu i le 80 - ua sauni e lolomiina
scoring.flag2: Mana'omia le Gaua'i Atu (Samasama): Sikoa 60-79 - fa'aleleia atili ni nai mea laiti ua fautuaina
scoring.flag3: Fa'ailoga mo le Iloiloga (Moli): Sikoa 40-59 - mana'omia le iloiloga a'o le'i lolomiina
scoring.flag4: Mataupu Taua (Mumu): Sikoa i lalo ifo o le 40 - aua le lolomiina se'ia vagana ua foia
scoring.disclosureDesc: Mo anotusi fa'alauiloa, e siaki fo'i e le polokalama:
scoring.disclosure1: E Fa'alauiloa: E iloa ai pe o fa'asalalauga pe lagolagoina le anotusi
scoring.disclosure2: O lo'o iai le Fa'ailoaina: Siaki mo le fa'ailoaina sa'o o le #ad, #sponsored, po'o le pa'aga
scoring.disclosure3: Tausisia o Tulafono Fa'aitulagi: Fa'amaonia mana'oga fa'asalalau a le FTC (US), EU, ma Nouei
scoring.disclosure4: O le misi o le fa'ailoaina e mafua ai se Soliga Maualuga (-25 points) i le Sikoa o le Tausisia
scoring.tip: E toe fuafuaina togi i taimi uma e iloilo ai anotusi. Faaaoga le vaega Toe Tusi e faaleleia ai otometi anotusi e maualalo togi a'o faatumauina pea lau savali.

analyze.intro: O le faiga o galuega a le Analyze Content e fesoasoani ia te oe e iloilo ai anotusi o loʻo iai mo le tausisia o tulafono, tulaga maaleale o aganuʻu, ma le lelei aʻo leʻi lolomiina.
analyze.stepsDesc: Mulimuli i laasaga nei e iloilo ai au anotusi:
analyze.step1: Alu i le Content Intelligence > Analyze Content tab
analyze.step2: Faapipii pe lolomi lau anotusi i le vaega o tusitusiga
analyze.step3: Filifili se Fa'amatalaga Fa'ata'atitia e fa'aoga ai au taiala fa'ailoga
analyze.step4: Filifili pe siaki le 'Fa'atupuina se ata fa'atasi' pe afai e te mana'o i le AI e fatuina se ata vaaia
analyze.step5: Kiliki le 'Analyze' e fa'atino ai le auiliiliga atoa
analyze.type1: Siakiina o le Tausisia o Tulafono: Fa'amaonia anotusi e fa'atatau i faiga fa'avae ma tulafono faatonutonu a le fausaga (FTC, GDPR)
analyze.type2: Ma'ale'ale Fa'aleaganuu: Su'esu'ega mo mea e ono fa'atiga pe le ma'ale'ale fa'aleaganuu
analyze.type3: Fa'amaoniga o le Sa'o: Siaki le sa'o o tagi ma mea moni
analyze.type4: Fa'atulagaina o Fa'ailoga: Fa'atusatusa anotusi e fa'asaga i au ta'iala o le Talaaga Fa'ata'atitia
analyze.tip: Faaaoga le faamau 'Toe Tusi' e faaleleia otometi ai anotusi e maua i lalo ifo o le 70 togi. O le a foia e le AI faafitauli ua faailogaina a'o faatumauina pea lau savali.

generate.intro: O le faiga o galuega o le Generate Content e faʻaaogaina le AI e fatu ai ni anotusi fou e faʻavae i lau autu, manaʻoga o le fausaga, ma taiala o le faʻailoga.
generate.step1: Alu i le Content Intelligence > Content Creation tab
generate.step2: Ulufale i lau autu pe fa'amatala le mea e te mana'o e fatuina
generate.step3: Filifili lau fa'avae (platform) fa'amoemoeina ma le leo tusitusi
generate.step4: Filifili se Fa'amatalaga Fa'ata'atia mo le tumau o le fa'ailoga
generate.step5: Kiliki le 'Fa'atupuina' e fatu ai anotusi e fa'aaogaina e le AI
generate.optionsDesc: Fa'apitoa au anotusi ua fatuina i nei filifiliga:
generate.option1: Filifiliga o le Fa'avae: Filifili se tasi pe tele fa'avae (LinkedIn, Twitter, Facebook, Instagram)
generate.option2: Leo o le Tusitusi: Filifili mai le Fa'apolofesa, Fa'asamasamanoa, Musuia, po'o le Fa'amatalaga
generate.option3: Umi o le Anotusi: Fetuuna'i le umi fa'amoemoeina mo au anotusi
generate.option4: Fausiaina o Ata: Fa'aola e fatu ai se ata fa'atasi e gaosia e le AI
generate.tip: E otometi lava ona iloiloina anotusi ua gaosia pe a uma ona fatuina. Toe iloilo togi ma fa'aaoga faamau o manatu faaalia e toe fa'afouina pe a mana'omia.

schedulePrompt.intro: E mafai ai e le Schedule Prompt ona e fa'atulaga le gaosiga otometi o anotusi e fa'agaoioia i taimi fa'atulagaina, ma fa'atumuina ai lau kalena o anotusi e aunoa ma le fa'alavelave fa'atino lima.
schedulePrompt.howToDesc: Fausia ni fa'atonuga e otometi lava ona gaosia ai anotusi:
schedulePrompt.step1: Fausia lau fa'amatalaga e fatuina ai anotusi fa'atasi ai ma autu ma mea e te fiafia i ai
schedulePrompt.step2: Seti le taimi e fa'atulaga ai le faasologa (i aso ta'itasi, fa'alevaiaso, po'o aso fa'apitoa)
schedulePrompt.step3: Filifili le taimi e tatau ona fatuina ai anotusi
schedulePrompt.step4: Fa'agaoioia le 'Auto-analyze' e fa'atino ai le au'ili'iliga i anotusi ua gaosia e aunoa ma se otometi
schedulePrompt.benefit1: Tausia pea le fa'asalalauina o pou e aunoa ma galuega fa'atino i aso ta'itasi
schedulePrompt.benefit2: Fausia anotusi i taimi sili ona lelei o le fatufatuga
schedulePrompt.benefit3: Fausia se lisi o anotusi mo le iloiloga ma le faamaoniga
schedulePrompt.tip: O fa'atonuga fa'atulagaina e fa'atupuina ai anotusi i au tusitusiga. Toe iloilo ma fa'amaonia a'o le'i fa'asalalauina e fa'amautinoa ai le lelei.

schedulePost.intro: E mafai ai e le Schedule Post ona e fa'atulaga anotusi ua fa'amaonia mo le lolomiina otometi i taimi sili ona lelei i au fa'asalalauga fa'aagafesootai feso'ota'i.
schedulePost.step1: Mai so'o se vaaiga o anotusi, kiliki le 'Fa'atulaga' nai lo le 'Fa'asalalau Nei'
schedulePost.step2: Filifili lau aso ma le taimi fa'amoemoe mo le lolomiina
schedulePost.step3: Filifili po'o fea fa'asalalauga fa'aagafesootai feso'ota'i e te lolomi ai
schedulePost.step4: Fa'amaonia ma fa'aopoopo i lau fa'asologa ua fa'atulagaina
schedulePost.option1: Taimi Faapitoa: Filifili se aso ma se taimi tonu mo le lolomiina
schedulePost.option2: Taimi Sili Ona Lelei: Tu'u i le AI e fautua mai taimi sili ona lelei e fa'asalalau ai e fa'atatau i fa'amaumauga o feso'ota'iga
schedulePost.option3: Tele-Fa'avae: Fa'atulaga le anotusi tutusa i luga o le tele o fa'avae i le taimi e tasi
schedulePost.warning: O pou fa'atulagaina e mana'omia ai le itiiti ifo ma le tasi le teugatupe fa'asalalauga fa'aagafesootai e feso'ota'i. Fa'afeso'ota'i teugatupe i Fa'atulagaga > Talaaga Fa'aagafesootai.

approval.intro: E fa'amautinoa e le Approval Workflow le lelei o anotusi e ala i le mana'omia o le iloiloga a le pule a'o le'i lolomiina. E taua tele lenei mea mo 'au fa'apisinisi ma pisinisi fa'atonutonuina.
approval.processDesc: Auala e faagasolo ai anotusi i le faagasologa o le faamaoniga:
approval.step1: E tuʻuina atu e le foafoa anotusi e ala i le kilikiina o le 'Tuʻuina atu mo le Faʻamaoniga'
approval.step2: O anotusi e aliali mai i le Faasologa Faamaonia a le pule
approval.step3: E iloilo e le pule anotusi, togi, ma taunuuga o le au'ili'iliga
approval.step4: E faamaonia e le pule, talosagaina ni suiga, pe teena le anotusi
approval.status1: Tusiga: O lo'o galueaina le anotusi, e le'i tu'uina atu lava
approval.status2: Faatali mo le Faamaoniga: Ua tuuina atu ma o loo faatalitali mo le iloiloga a le pule
approval.status3: Ua faamaonia: Sauni e lolomi pe faatulaga
approval.status4: Manaʻomia le Toe Teuteuina: Sa talosagaina e le Pule ni suiga - siaki ni manatu faaalia ma toe lafo atu
approval.tip: Fa'aopoopo ni fa'amatalaga pe a tu'uina atu anotusi e fa'ailoa atu ai i le au iloilo le anotusi e uiga i au fa'ai'uga fatufatua'i. E fa'avavevave ai le fa'agasologa o le fa'amaoniaina.

gdpr.weValuePrivacy: Matou te Fa'atauaina Lou Tulaga Faalilolilo
gdpr.cookieDescription: Matou te fa'aaogaina kuki e fa'aleleia atili ai lau poto masani i le su'esu'eina o mea, tu'uina atu anotusi fa'apitoa, ma iloilo a matou feoa'iga. I le kilikiina o le "Talia Uma", ua e malie i la matou fa'aaogaina o kuki. E mafai ona e fa'apitoa au mea e te fiafia i ai pe teena kuki e le taua.
gdpr.readPrivacyPolicy: Faitau la matou Faiga Faavae mo le Tulaga Faalilolilo
gdpr.essentialCookiesDesc: E manaʻomia mo le faʻamaoniga, puipuiga, ma galuega faʻavae. E le mafai ona faʻagata.
gdpr.analyticsCookiesDesc: Fesoasoani mai ia matou ia malamalama i le auala e fegalegaleai ai tagata asiasi ma la matou fausaga e faaleleia atili ai a matou auaunaga.
gdpr.marketingCookiesDesc: Fa'aaogaina e fa'alauiloa ai fa'asalalauga fa'apitoa ma fua ai le aoga o fa'asalalauga.
